name: Love Tactics: Joined Together (GMTK Version)
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam! The theme was "Joined Together."

Two lovers, a guardian named Onyxia and a mage named Nenna, fight alongside each other, healing when close, and taking damage when apart. Fight through three tactics game levels and watch a story about love unfold!
